resources.string: This app needs access to your notifications to view the current song. If you have not granted permission yet, tap here.
If a song name is stuck, you can clear it by tapping here.
Tap to choose which app to open when you tap on the widget and no music is playing. For large widgets, you can still get back to this menu with the icon in the lower right corner.
Show settings icon in the lower-right corner
Enable rounded corners for the album artwork
Hide the widget when no media is playing
If the widget is flickering when the song changes, this may help. It adds a slight delay before updating the widget.
Tap the button below to finalize the changes and reload the widget.
